text: atmavan eva maranayata pat vana mohote da nindedi maranayata pat novu dæ da atpat kara ganne allahya. kavara atmayak mata maranaya tindu kaleda eya (apasu noyava) ohu randava taba gani. sesu dæ niyama karana lada kalayak dakva ohu evanu æta. vataha ganna janayata niyata vasayenma ehi samgna æta
